A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was disappointing when compared to its predecessor. It just seemed like liberal propaganda. All males are incompetent and need strong women to lead. The villains were white men while all the heroes were minorities and had female leaders. Luke's arc seemed to end on a whimper. The new Jedi is a young female who knows everything she needs to know and needs not the wisdom of her predecessors. A nod to the \"know it all\" millennial generation. The whole thing is just disappointing and if this is a foreshadow of where Disney is taking the series I won't be at all interested in where it's going.
